author: Humeyra Pamuk
title: Pompeo will not self-isolate after Afghanistan, Qatar trip
description: U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo will not self-isolate after returning from Afghanistan and Qatar on Tuesday because neither country was on a U.S. government list calling for such precautions when he visited, a State Department medical official said.
content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo will not self-isolate after returning from Afghanistan and Qatar on Tuesday because neither country was on a U.S. government list calling for such precautions when he visited, a State Department medic… [+2636 chars]
